name: ChaosEsque Anthology
description:
Install instructions

To use the game simply download the ISO images and mount them or burn them to disc. Then copy the game to wherever you wish. The first Volume is the main game. The second Volume is additional maps and textures. Merge the directories or simply copy the /data/*.pk3 into your game /data/ directory.

The ISOs include a map editor and other utilities for content creation. The game includes over 200 weapons, as-well as 6gb of opensource textures, models, music, spells, vehicles, buildings (with interiors), and the like.
